name: Swap-Swap Panda
summary:
Swap-Swap Panda is a cute platform game where two pandas go on an adventure to take back the cupcakes stolen by some pesky ninjas. You will cross a wonderful land full of bamboo forests, fantastic sights, and hazards.

You'll be in control of two pandas, a chubby giant panda and a funny red panda, each of which with different abilities needed to overcome all the obstacles in the levels. That's right, just with teamwork you'll be able to get through all the levels, by switching pandas and controlling one at a time.

Giant panda will be able to swim in lakes carrying red panda on its back, on the other hand red panda is able to climb bamboo and activate switches to open the path for giant panda.
